Message: "Hey, did you see the client's feedback on the mockups?"
"Just saw it. They want a lot of changes to the color scheme."
"Yeah, that's what I was thinking. It's a big shift from the original brief."
"I'll start on the revisions. Can you update the project timeline?"
"Will do. I'll block out the rest of the week for it."
"Any plans for Saturday?"
"Not yet, was thinking of heading to the new bookstore in Swaroop Nagar."
"Oh, the one near the park? I heard it's great."
"Yeah, that's the one. Want to join?"
"Sounds good! What time?"
"How about around 3 PM?"
"Are you free? My laptop just went blank."
"Oh no. Did you try a hard reboot?"
"Tried it twice. Nothing."
"Okay, try connecting it to an external monitor. Maybe the display is the issue."
"Good idea, let me find a cable."
"Let me know if that works. If not, we might have to call IT."
"Finally watched that new sci-fi movie everyone's talking about."
"Nice! What did you think? I loved the visuals."
"Visuals were amazing, but the plot was a bit predictable for me."
"I can see that. The ending felt a bit rushed. Still a fun watch though."
"Definitely. Worth it just for the big screen experience."
